meanings.definition: The quality or state of being bad.
meanings.sent1: The badness of the situation was overwhelming.
meanings.sent2: The badness of his behavior was evident to everyone.
meanings.sent3: Despite the badness of the weather, they decided to go for a walk.
meanings.sent4: The badness of the news hit her like a ton of bricks.
meanings.sent5: The badness of the food made her lose her appetite.

meanings.definition: Something that is bad or undesirable.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't stand the badness of the taste in her mouth.
meanings.sent2: The badness of the movie made him regret buying the ticket.
meanings.sent3: The badness of the situation was so ridiculous, it was almost funny.
meanings.sent4: The badness of the situation was like a dark cloud hanging over them.
meanings.sent5: The badness of the smell was unbearable.

meanings.definition: The extent of something being bad.
meanings.sent1: The badness of the damage was beyond repair.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't believe the badness of the traffic that day.
meanings.sent3: The badness of the joke made everyone burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The badness of the pain was like a sharp knife stabbing him.
meanings.sent5: The badness of the mistake was impossible to ignore.
